short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alt Text Automator will generate alt text for images on any webpage with the click of a button.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quality alt text for images on your web site is essential for SEO and accessibility. However, writing alt text for every image is no fun task.

The Alt Text Automator chrome plugin automates the generation of alt text for any image on your website. Simply click on the image, and our ai-powered tooling will generate an alt text and add it to your profile.

Furthermore, you can generate alt text in your preferred language and easily include SEO-keywords you would like to target.

Sign up on https://www.alttextautomator.com to get started for free.
